column4: I found a bug, but I'm not even sure how to go about reporting it. If you use the basic ubuntu install with evolution and bogofilter all works fine. But as soon as you do all the update from 6.10 forward bogofilter begins to terminate unexpectedly. I forced me to download, compile and install an update version of bogofilter to fix the problem. Who should I report the issue to, UBUNTU or BOGOFILTER?
play with the settings in /etc/default -- start with acpi-support
all right, apart from the fact that you're so blatantly contradicting me about the test ^^
because I'm not in the US
neither am I, and I can get it here in Mexico with ubuntu.
well, I can't get it here, but never mind, it's not support related, so off topic.
how do I get my DESKTOP EFFECTS working? It says composite extension not installed.
I waste enough time chatting on IRC. I'm not going to make it worse by trying wobbly windows ;)
no, I use graphical interfaces and like coffee with milk
